body:
Release Notes

Network360 Team

The Network360 Team is pleased to release the first phase of enhancements for the Recruitment module!

Enhancements

Recruitment
  • Now, you can search for providers to recruit based on address confidence, specialty confidence, confirmed practicing and/or new providers.
  • To include this in your search criteria, click “Show advanced options” on the criteria selection page.
  • Then, select the options you want.
    • You can search for multiple confidence levels at the same time for each type of confidence level:
      • High and Medium confidence level.
      • Medium and Low confidence levels.
      • However, you cannot search for High and Low confidence levels at the same time. Instead, perform two different searches.
  • Click the Go button to see the results page.
  • You can see the confidence levels specified within the csv export.
Activity Stream
  • Now when you generate a Provider List, your selected geography will be listed first within the activity stream summary.
